parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1** to **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of **NextToken**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the server group belongs.

parameters.name: ServerGroupNames
parameters.description: The names of the server groups to be queried. You can specify at most 10 server group names.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags that are added to the server group. You can specify up to 10 tags in each call.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC).
